thread.section_title: Hobbylinc.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hobbylinc.com | www.hobbylinc.com
thread.title: John Jakum

author: John Jakum
title: John Jakum
text: I`ve ordered from Hobbylinc in the past and received good service, with this order it actually arrived a day early, but unfortunately it went to the wrong address, I had to chase it down to receive it ( went to my neighbor).I checked the package and it was addressed right, I have no idea why the post office delivered it next door. I know this is beyond your control, and because so I will still order from you in the future.
